title: Altitude
description: Altitude is a pet-friendly apartment building located in Atlanta, GA. It offers a variety of floor plans, including 1 and 2-bedroom options. The apartments feature amenities such as a parking garage, outdoor patio, and on-site management. The property is conveniently located near the heart of Atlanta, providing easy access to dining, shopping, and entertainment options. With its modern design and desirable amenities, Altitude offers a comfortable and convenient living experience.
